overview: Mort Greenberg is currently the VP Sales at NBC Universal’s Local Media Division. Prior to NBC Universal Mort was VP Sales for Metacafe, a Tel Aviv based, Accel & Benchmark backed video start up, founded by Eyal Hertzog and Arik Czerniak. Mort joined Metacafe in November 2006, and left for NBC Universal in March 2008. Prior to Metacafe Mort was at IAC/Interactive Corp following their acquistion of Ask Jeeves. Prior to joining Ask Jeeves in 2001 Mort was on the start up sales team for iWon.com in 2000, and also part of the start up sales team at Excite.com in 1996. Prior to Excite Mort held 2 traditional sales roles at Instiutional Investor Magazine Group, and Blair Television.
